# Patient data to database

## Description

- This project does one simple job: read a text file and move all that data into a database.
- Start it on a console with "python3 ./src/main.py ./data/potilaat.txt ./data/patientData.db patients"

The assignment is as follows:
```
The assignment is to read patient's treatment periods from a message stream into a database using Python. You may choose the operating system and the SQL-database by yourself. Column types must fit for the given data. Only the entries that have arrivaldate of 7.6.2006 or later, will be read into the database. Primary key is Patientnumber and arrivaldate.
```

And the given data:
